mapper.select: SELECT a.review_uid, a.mb_uid, a.store_uid, a.review_rate, a.review_content, a.review_ban, a.review_viewCount, a.review_date, b.store_type, b.store_name, c.mb_id FROM NMJ_review a , NMJ_store b, NMJ_member c WHERE a.store_uid = b.store_uid AND a.mb_uid = c.mb_uid AND a.store_uid = #{store_uid} ORDER BY review_uid DESC

SELECT store_uid, mb_uid, store_name, store_address, store_tel, store_hours, store_content, store_img_org, store_img_sav, store_regNum, store_regImg_org, store_regImg_sav, store_lat, store_long, store_type, store_dtype, store_ratings, store_rateCount FROM nmj_store WHERE store_uid = #{store_uid} ;
mapper.update: UPDATE nmj_store SET store_tel = #{dto.store_tel}, store_hours = #{dto.store_hours}, store_content = #{dto.store_content}, store_img_org = #{dto.store_img_org}, store_img_sav = #{dto.store_img_sav} WHERE store_uid = #{dto.store_uid} ;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM nmj_storedtype ORDER BY store_type ASC, store_dtype ASC ;
SELECT * FROM nmj_food WHERE store_uid = #{store_uid} ORDER BY food_name ASC, food_price ASC ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nmj_food (store_uid, food_img_org, food_img_sav, food_price, food_name) VALUES (#{dto.store_uid}, #{dto.food_img_org}, #{dto.food_img_sav}, #{dto.food_price}, #{dto.food_name}) ;
